ServiceSid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Service.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Webhook resource to update.

EventTypes.description: The array of events that this Webhook is subscribed to. Possible event types: `*, factor.deleted, factor.created, factor.verified, challenge.approved, challenge.denied`

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the webhook. **This value should not contain PII.**

WebhookUrl.description: The URL associated with this Webhook.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Service resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**event_types**: The array of events that this Webhook is subscribed to. Possible event types: `*, factor.deleted, factor.created, factor.verified, challenge.approved, challenge.denied`
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the webhook. **This value should not contain PII.**
**service_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Service.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Webhook resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Webhook resource.
**webhook_url**: The URL associated with this Webhook.
